nodes.text: The Laser Flit Hangout was an underground building on the outskirts of Mos Espa on Tatooine. It was used as an hideout by the Laser Flits, a local gang of teens.

When the Laser Flits ambushed a delivery of swoop parts from Watto's shop destined for Qord D'Baelor, Wald paid a spacer to retrieve the parts. The spacer entered the Laser Flit's hangout, killed many gang members and brought back the swoop parts.

The Laser Flit Hangout was a location in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. It was added to the game as part of the quest titled "Wald's Woes" with the release of "Chapter 2: The Talus Incident", on August 1, 2006.
